evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Declaring that the termination of SEVIS status for Plaintiffs and all similarly situated F-1 visa holders... was unlawful, and that their SEVIS records and F-1 status shall be restored immediately

evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Preliminarily and permanently enjoining Defendants from further SEVIS terminations without lawful process
